parameters.subject: Pending Termination Orders
parameters.text:
Hello,

Please find the attachments for the pending termination report.

* This email is generated by an automated weekly report workflow.

Thanks,
Qnut Bot

parameters.query:
SELECT
ccs.customer_contract_subscriptionid as SubscriptionId,
c.customerid,
pc.product_catalogue_name,
ccs.created_at ,
ccs.contract_period_start,
ccs.bill_from ,
ccstatus.status status,
CASE
WHEN provisioning_status = 0 THEN "NOT SENT"
WHEN provisioning_status = 1 THEN "ACTIVE"
WHEN provisioning_status = 2 THEN "TERMINATED"
WHEN provisioning_status = 3 THEN "FAILED"
WHEN provisioning_status = 4 THEN "UNDER ACTIVATION"
WHEN provisioning_status = 5 THEN "UNDER TERMINATTION"
WHEN provisioning_status = 6 THEN "PARTLY FAILED"
WHEN provisioning_status = 7 THEN "CREATED"
WHEN provisioning_status = 8 THEN "WAITING 4 DELIVERY"
WHEN provisioning_status = 9 THEN "WAITING ON HUMAN TASK"
WHEN provisioning_status = 99 THEN "MANUAL"
ELSE "UNKNOWN"
END provisioning_status
FROM customer_contract_subscription ccs
JOIN customer_order co on co.customer_orderid = ccs.customer_orderid
JOIN customer_contract cc on cc.customer_contractid = ccs.customer_contractid
JOIN customer_contract_status ccstatus on ccstatus.customer_contract_statusid = ccs.contract_status
JOIN product_catalogue pc on pc.product_catalogueid = ccs.product_catalogueid
JOIN customer_network cn on cc.customer_networkid = cn.customer_networkid
JOIN customer c on c.crmid = cc.crmid
WHERE ccs.contract_status in (6)
-- AND provisioning_status = 7
AND cn.name != 'Productiontest'
-- AND ccs.contract_period_start < CURDATE()
order BY ccs.created_at
;
